sentences.sentence: In 2011 the Editors of The Econometrics Journal initiated the annual Denis Sargan Econometrics Prize.
sentences.translation: 2011年，《计量经济学杂志》的编辑发起了一年一度的丹尼斯•萨根计量经济学奖.

sentences.sentence: For example, Organic Chemistry and Econometrics are supposed to be weeder courses.
sentences.translation: 例如，《有机化学》和《经济计量学》都可能是这样的筛选课程。

sentences.sentence: This month we asked Cambridge Econometrics, an economic-modelling firm, to assess the impact of a carbon tax on the economy.
sentences.translation: 本月我们邀请经济建模公司剑桥计量(Cambridge Econometrics)估算碳排放征税对经济可能产生的冲击。
